message.body: Don't forget to get your free wawa today
Also do you want to go apartment hunting with me one of these days?
I know I want to
And yeah, depends when though?
whenever.
figured I should start looking at places in person now though
I'll have to see. I've had almost no free time lately
ok le me know
Hey, if you would like easy money, let me know. LDC is trying to increase its informal text database and is looking for text message donations. You would
receive $0.05 per text. #### did it and is receiving about $300.
You have the option of going through them first and removing whole conversations and individual messages. Also, everything is made anonymous, and we filt
er out inappropriate content, personally identifying information, etc.
Also, the most you can get is $500. So about 10,000 texts
Yea sure absolutely. I need money for my apartment fund lol
Haha okay I thought so
I'll forward you instructions
Thanks!
I just sent it to your gmail
It used to be, donate texts, and enter to win 300 dollars. You can ignore any mention of that. It's pay per text now.
Sweet thanks
You are welcome
